description:
This course is for students starting with video making with the software Camtasia for Windows, the most important recording software for video and tutorial making. In this course you will learn the basics of project managing with Camtasia for Windows.

After installing and setting it, you will learn how to use all the software functions, how recording and editing video and audio, adding and editing effects, texts and callouts, clips and subtitles, creating animations, setting a good sound quality and finally exporting your final videos.

To address this course of Camtasia for Windows, you'll need a computer with Windows installed, and the software Camtasia for Windows, that we will download and install together in the first lectures.

Attention: Camtasia can be download and used for free -full version- for 30 days
title: Camtasia for Windows
